name: News-MCP Database
description: News aggregation and processing platform database

bookmarks.name: Active Feeds
bookmarks.query: SELECT * FROM feeds WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY last_fetched DESC;

bookmarks.name: Recent Items
bookmarks.query: SELECT * FROM items ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 100;

bookmarks.name: Failed Fetches
bookmarks.query: SELECT * FROM fetch_log WHERE status = 'error' ORDER BY started_at DESC LIMIT 50;
